translation:
Do you know which area of ‚Äã‚ÄãDeep Learning is expected to see the biggest growth in 2020? Can you guess which AI market is expected to reach $22.3 billion by 2025? And can you name the field of data science that experts like Yann LeCunn, Yoshua Bengio and Geoff Hinton are currently betting on?

If you answered Natural Language Processing to all three of these questions, you're on the right track! This area is expected to take the spotlight in 2020, and if you're not prepared, you might be left behind!

In this course you will learn the latest and most powerful Natural Language Processing techniques:

- Create an English to Portuguese language translator using Google's Transformer architecture
- Create a Convolutional Neural Network specialized in Natural Language Processing to classify feelings in a Tweeter database

translation:
NEW COURSE! Various predictions suggest that 80% of companies will be using chatbots by 2020, and companies that have not yet integrated this type of technology into their business operations could fall behind the competition! There is a huge demand for building basic chatbots that work for businesses. Companies are looking for developers in this area, which opens up new opportunities in the job market!
